extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of B- in 6.0 units from (DRAM100; DRAM181; BISC100;BISC101) or permission of the Department.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from DRAM 200; DRAM 201; DRAM 202; DRAM 210.

basic.description: A chronological survey of production methods, architecture, performance, and dramatic literature in western and eastern theatre traditions from early classical eras to the end of the 19th century.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Theatre History & Literature I
